website_summaries.verdict: An economical accessory kit that includes everything you need to get the most out of your GoPro.
pros: Comes with a first-rate chest belt strap mount and J-hook buckle that allow you to seamlessly attach your GoPro to your chest
Handheld mount is simple to extend or shorten as needed
Comes with a distinct floating handle grip that enables you to use your GoPro while scuba diving, surfing and enjoying other water activities
cons: Kit's adhesive stickers are very weak
Inferior quality in comparison to similar kits

customer_reviews.title: ... a feel for what a real camera would be like since they like to go with me on wild ...
customer_reviews.text: both my granddaughters ages 5 and 11 have action cams that I bought for them as a first camera to get a feel for what a real camera would be like since they like to go with me on wild life photo shoots. the youngest one loves the chest harness and her older sister love the selfie stick and the head harness. I have plans in the near future to buy one of these little action cameras also and the accessories pack like this one and really put every thing through its paces in a more in-depth review.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Mixed quality parts.
customer_reviews.text: Some parts are very good, others are cheap. The suction cup mount works very well, stuck it to the side of a helicopter and it stayed on for 6 hours of flight without any issues. That alone makes this pack worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Payt.

customer_reviews.title: I'd go with this one
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good starter kit for when you're looking to enhance your GoPro's ability to be in places. It's also good because it gives you several mounting screws and quick-release clips. You may not use all of the components. I wore the body component like once, and we're never gonna use the bouyancy attachment. So far we've mainly used the swivel clip and the selfie stick. Selfie sticks are normally for squares, but they're SUPER useful for GoPros because you can reach high places, carry it in front of you for videos that don't look like crap, and it's probably the best thing to have on you if you are gonna take the thing underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan R. Carter

customer_reviews.title: So Many Items For The Cost!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this online, and thought that it wouldn't quite stack up. When it arrived, I was taken aback. It was very complete. It had gizmos and gadgets that I finally figured out (I never read directions-I am a Man).I have only used a few things out of the kit and it has basically paid for itself. VERY INEXPENSIVE for the Kit. I would buy another one. Thank you, by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Westside

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and affordable
customer_reviews.text: All these accessories seem to be very durable; I especially noticed it with the chest, head, and bar mounts. The pieces hole very secure and I trust that it will not break in use. The only thing that was NOT too great (but an amazing accessory either way) was the tripod. The top two joints are very sensitive to movement, and the weight of my GoPro Hero causes it to angle downwards sometimes. Overall, this accessory pack is perfect. It has the same types of accessories as a GoPro brand, but for an incredibly affordable price
customer_reviews.author: BboyGi11s

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all you need to use your action camera on land, air, and sea! I have used it in the Caribbean for snorkeling and use many of the rigs for recording my motorcycle rides. My helmet attachment is still holding strong and it's been on for a year in all kinds of riding weather, including snow. I use the chest rig when I am recording my son and his airsoft team competing in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P

customer_reviews.title: Lots of goodies in the bag just like you see in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Wow, got it was impressed. Lots of goodies in the bag just like you see in the photo. I thought Christmas was here and santa came and saw me early (It's September now). Worth the cost, save big with this bulk accessory pack. You will be glad you did. There are more things in there than I would typically use, but it's good to have them for that specific situation when you may need them. If you don't use a certain one, give it to a buddy, good stocking stuffer for that gopro person you know and love.
customer_reviews.author: Entoone

customer_reviews.title: Not truly compatible with the Yi 4k or Yi 4k+
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the descriptions states that it's compatible with the Yi 4k, however that's really only true of the selfie stick. The kit does not include an adapter or case that allows it to work with the head mount, chest mount, or any of the other included accessories. I'm sure it works just fine for GoPro devices, but I've got to give it a low rating due to the lack of clarity in the device description. I wish I had read the comments prior to ordering, but I will be returning this package.
customer_reviews.author: kidnova

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality, Bad designs.
customer_reviews.text: So much for so little makes it a great deal either way but there were a lot of flaws. - Chest strap is pretty small and I'm a pretty slender guy. - A lot of the connection points were too small and showed damage in important areas once I finally forced the GoPro on. - Floaty device is a cheap looking plastic, not rubbery material. This creates the risk of the plastic cracking while in use and filling with water. - Provided bag won't even fit half of the items included (in case you thought it would fit everything).
customer_reviews.author: Devonvp

customer_reviews.title: Incredible amount of items for the money! Seems to be as good as gopro brand accessories.
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice kit for the money! These items are $20-30++ for EACH item if you buy the gopro brand! I handled the entire kit and it seems as well built as the original gopro mounts that came with my camera. Seems like good quality stuff and it's a TON of stuff for $20! Can't wait to use these mounts for different things. The main items I bought this kit for were the handlebar mount for my motorcycle, the suction cup for my rock crawler jeep and floating handle for our cruise in March. The wife and I plan on doing some of the snorkeling trips and I can't wait to film it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Options At a Very Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to figure out all the different adaptors etc. that are included. About the only disappointment was the suction type adaptor for the car. Didn't work at all. In fact the clear part that is supposed to stick was falling off the unit when I first tried it. But everything else is quite versatile. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: KenBurnham

customer_reviews.title: Great GoPro accessory kit for the budget minded
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Go Pro camera and wanted an accessory kit. This one was a great price and a bit of overkill. There were so many pieces and options for everything imaginable. The only con is that there wasn't a list to let you know what all those pieces went to and for a novice using a camera that would have made it so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price for everything you could need to hold you GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package for my GoPro5 black. I had looked at other holders but this one gives you any and everything you could need for a fraction of the cost. I use the one for the water all the time out on the boat and the wave runner. I have also used the little tripod that can wrap around things to hold in ways a normal tripod can't. This is a great deal, again for the price of one or two of these if you bought them at Best Buy you can have everything you could ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great accessory pack for my new AKASO Action camera EK7000. There are so many individual parts that will allow me to mount my camera in so many different ways. I would have thought for the low price that the quality of parts would be low- not so. These parts and mounts are built to hold my camera in place no matter what. I would highly recommend this product if you have an action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is junk
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I tried was the telescopic piece and when I extended it, it broke in two. They seem to think quantity makes up for quality. I'd prefer 1/2 the items with twice the quality. It might get the job done for some things for some folks but the fit and finish is pretty rough.
customer_reviews.author: mswlogo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you need all of this
customer_reviews.text: There was so much stuff in the package we received and if you are not really an active person that needs to use every kind of gadget to shoot a video then you'd better think of something with fewer gadgets. However, I paid $15 for the whole thing so that made it really cheaper than most of the other products that had less stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell if the stuff will stand up to use, but at first glance i couldn't be happier. And to get all of these accessories for $15??? Incredible deal. I saw other reviews where people had trouble with mounts not fitting but I have not found this to be the case. Everything works as it should. The mini "gorillapod" style tripod I can tell is very cheap and probably wont last, but did I mention this entire kit was only $15??? Excellent deal and value for the money. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Snell

customer_reviews.title: good, cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Some of the stuff is obviously cheap (the suction cup mount arrived broken) but you get what you pay for. Overall, I feel like it was a great pack to get started with the gopro, this affordable package offers a wide variety of products to experiment with and figure out what you like before you drop the big bucks on something else (like a suction cup mount, which I did buy a nicer one).
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your bucks!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even used them all.I love the tripod and float I've also used the head strap which is great. The suction cup works great too I guess by now you can tell i love these accessories. I recently got a gopro session so being a novice i didn't want to break the bank on accessories. This set is easy to for me to use. I've used them in the pool and beach with no issues the straps are snug. Overall great product!!
customer_reviews.author: MwanaWevhu

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Selfie stick is worthless, not strong enough to hold camera, falls over all the time. Even though the parts look identical some don't fit very well and you have to push super hard, twist, etc to get the screw to go through the holes. I haven't tried some of the products out on the car/motorcycle yet but will try inside on glass before outside if things fall off. You need extenders for the chest unit to work properly as the basic clamp on piece makes the camera point down, which happens with many of the mounts. The idea is good but not sure all the components were thought out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Diver

customer_reviews.title: Not bad set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items that are in the set are ok. The selfie stick its really not that durable. Material on it (metal and plastic) does not really hold the camera well. Couldn’t made the Car Suction Cup Mount to stick to anything ( tried in 3 different cars). Over all not bad set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, all things considered.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Yes theres a funny smell and oily film. But for the price you get alot of stuff. The chest harness is tight for big guys but is usable. Everything thus far tried fits without much difficulty. The selfie stick of mine has a groove so as to not twist under weight of camera, so they did remedy that issue, it is flimsy but should be okish. Suction cup mount sorta works if you mess with it. Adhesive mounts are fine if you clean surfaces with alcohol. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John Parrish

customer_reviews.title: awesome price for a great kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this accessory kit. There is no reason to purchase the GoPro brand. Pretty much every mount and band you can think of is in here - head mount, wrist, chest, adhesives, bendable tripod, etc. I brought the wrist strap surfing and the head strap zip lining and had no issues with either. The quality is good. There are multiple adhesives and multiple screws, so if you lose one there's a back up. All of the little pieces come in a bag as shown in the photo. Very happy with this purchase and I don't anticipate every having to buy any other GoPro accessories!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: A very useful kit with two issues
customer_reviews.text: You can not complain for a kit this complete at this price. However, for the kit I received, I don't have the flat plates (only curve ones) . The adhesives don't have 3M logo and don't look like 3M products and like one of the reviews mentioned they smell bad. With these two issues, now I have to spend extra money to buy the plates/adhesive package. [UPDATE] The vendor contacted me after seeing my review. After knowing I had missing parts in my package, they offered couple of options to resolve the issue. I choose to receive the missing parts and I did get them after a while. It's a good feeling knowing they are behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good deal for $18, but don’t trust any of it near water! As long as you can pick up your camera when it breaks, you should be ok. But the suction cup mount broke, my telescoping pole broke, and all of the bolts rusted. I was lucky that I was able to feel the pole break and grab my camera before the telescoping pole broke in two. The locking handle on the suction cup mount broke, so that was useless. And this was all on the first day!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for all of these accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great value for all of these accessories. The only thing that was a little disappointing in the package was the retractable "selfie" stick. For one there is no place to attach the GoPro remote, which is basically a necessity if you are using a long pole that keeps the camera out of reach. The pole also doesn't keep the weight of the camera from spinning upside down. Even still I can't complain too much considering the cost of this bundle. The same bundle from GoPro would cost you well over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Waltho

customer_reviews.title: This package has saved me a considerable amount of money ...
customer_reviews.text: This package has saved me a considerable amount of money. All of the products work with my gopro 5. The yellow handle and the head mount that I attach to my diving mask have lasted numerous dings and bangs against the rocks while still functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with a bunch of cool and useful Go Pro attachments and accessories. Yes they do fit the Go Pro camera casing. Definitely worth the price as well, seeing as if you were to purchase any one of these attachments from Go Pro for twice as much as this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lara

customer_reviews.title: Lots of parts and easy to assemble! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of the best products I have found on amazon. It includes everything you could ever need for a go pro. I used mine to ski and I attached the camera to my wrist with one of the straps and it worked perfectly. I could have also attached it to my helmet, but I liked having control of it on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming odor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return as the plastic smell was just too overwhelming to the point of making me feel nauseous. I left the box outside for a week, hoped the smell would dissipate somehow to no avail. Couldn’t bring any pieces indoors to try out. Have to wonder what kind of chemicals did the manufacturer put in these plastic pieces?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed at how much comes with this package at this ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how much comes with this package at this amazing price. Like most, I probably won't use everything, but there are some must-have items in there that are worth the price alone, especially the yellow floaty thing (not sure what it's called), the selfie-stick, the mini-tripod, and the stretchy band items that allow you to strap a Go-pro to your head or even chest. Extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Harden

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall i like the unit especially for the deal i got. The first kit ordered was short a few items but i wrote amazon and they had a new one sent out. Works with most action cameras
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for a pro-am accessory kit for Go Pro.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price! Better quality than my expectation from a random made in China accessory pack. It has everything I could think of for shooting with a go pro. I've used it on several music videos and the clips, straps and suction cups were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Material quality and durability (pieces break easy under pressure/vibrations) not as good as original gopro kit but worth purchasing just for the amount of stuff you get from this kit.
customer_reviews.author: IS011

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason they don't show 3M-adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Because they are not using it, and the result is the deck is totally not able to stick with the surfaces you want it to stay. The adhesive is more like a slick foam that does nothing. See picture. Tried to contact the seller, a few days later no response. Bad product quality + not responding seller, what do you think?
customer_reviews.author: Ryoizard

customer_reviews.title: Some good stuff in here, had some issues on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, but there is a few nags. The Chesty is made for people with a 38" chest or less, with super large shoulders, they should have included more adjustments there. My "floaty" yellow bit doesn't float and lets water in. Oh bother, I spent $14.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It is a great set!
customer_reviews.text: Kit came with everything! I love this kit because it has a mount for literally any event. I looked on Ebay and many other sellers around and this seemed to be the best deal that met my needs! When I received the set I was anxious​ to try my best to use all the mounts. However, it is very hard to find many uses for some things if you do not do certain activities. Still! this has more than enough mounts to get you through just about any event or activity!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: This is well worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: This is a great assortment of accessories!! Fits my GoPro perfectly without having to spend an arm and a leg. I'm so glad I bought this instead of buying all these separately.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Flat and Arc mounts rattles A LOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not so good, its ok to avoid buying all this stuff individually, but some items are not as good. Take for example the flat and arc mounts, the provided 3M pads to fix them are good, but anything I put in them (the surface quick release an J-Hook buckle) rattles a lot.. A LOT!!!! not even the silicon stuff to put in there (not included) ease the rattle. I have to fill it with electric tape to stop the rattle..
customer_reviews.author: Simonuca

customer_reviews.title: Great Accessory Kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit after returning the first one we bought a different one that was not very good. We decided to go with this and buy a case separately, which was the right choice. You can get the amazon basic kit for $10 or so and it is a great size and quality case to go along with this kit. So far, we have not used everything offered here but what we have used has been great and just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: GratefullyDyed

customer_reviews.title: Good first time kit to see what you might really use
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts are a little cheap, but even if only 30% of it was good, it would be worth the price, and I will use well over half of it. Some things I would never have bought, and this lets me try it out. The stuff that isn't up to my standards, but I find I actually use it, I can now go buy a more expensive version knowing I will actually use it. Basically, it is worth it just for the pieces I am satisfied with, plus the added benefit of being able to try stuff I wouldn't have bought otherwise. I think it's easily worth 50% more that the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an awesome package. I use the chest harness a lot for downhill mountain biking. I have taken a few pretty good spills and the straps have held up under all the beatings it has taken. Comes with a little bag which is nice to just throw what ever mounts you might need for the day in your car or whatever. The little tripod is pretty handy as well. The legs are bendable so you can wrap it around poles or where ever you need to get the perfect shot! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me. No problems with failures at all.
customer_reviews.text: Man there is a lot of stuff here. All of the parts fit decent enough. If I was Shaun White I would probably need real gopro accessories. But I am a casual gopro user, biking, sailing and hiking, If this stuff breaks it will most likely be my fault. I would recommend this kit for anyone like me, (someone that doesnt plan to fall on their gopro) it has all you will need to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Steve blahut

customer_reviews.title: Misleading due to missing important parts to utilize the accessories
customer_reviews.text: The package is a bit misleading because it did not include the crucial parts that are necessary to have in order to use your camera WITHOUT the waterproof case which means no sound can be heard and it’s necessary in order to film certain things without the waterproof case. So I’m very disappointed bc I tried to figure out for quite a while how I can attach my camera onto the accessories. Now I need to spend more $ to get those parts I need for it to be able to be attached to the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Maya 7900

customer_reviews.title: Great value, really useful items in this kit.
customer_reviews.text: These accessories served as a great starting point. I've used almost all of them, but I have a few favorites. The construction seems pretty solid, but I have had tripod adapter break. I was putting it through heavy usage though. My favorites are: • The water float/bobble • Head strap • The clip • Suction The clip was VERY strong. While in the jungle I clipped it to vines (after checking for snakes of course) and small tree limbs to get stable video clips and also group pictures. This was DEFINITELY worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Has Every Part You Could Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: My daughter won a GoPro (lucky her) and so we needed an accessory pack to be able to take selfies and attach it to the dashboard or a helmet. This kit came with every conceivable accessory you could possible need for your GoPro- selfie stick, chest strap, helmet strap, dashboard mount. I used the helmet strap and wore the GoPro all day through zip-lining and swimming - and it didnt budge. Very Secure. I got awsome footage. This is a wonderful kit. There are so many pieces I just wish I knew what every part was for.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, love it. Bonus?!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a "gopro" clone and wanted more accessories so I could attach it to the front bumper of my sports car. This kit has plenty of options for me to use it on car, my bike, etc... not sure if your kit will have this extra, but mine also came with a mini tripod not pictured (bonus!). Thank you!. Randy
customer_reviews.author: Randy from ATL

customer_reviews.title: Sure it smells funky but everything works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Yeah there is plastic stink but it fades. For the price everything works with my gopro6 flawlessly. Just as good as sets costing much more. Built well overall and unless you let a dog chew on it, it’s gonna last. I find no faults with any of the items included and fully recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: So many accessories with this package. I’m completely happy with what I received. I will be making some amazing motorcycle videos with these attachments.
customer_reviews.author: c  cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bundle For Any Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this set for almost 2 months now and its the best set money can buy. Its compatible with my GoPro oriiginal and my Lightdow 6000. Its alot cheaper then the name brand accessories and works just as well as they do. I use my action cameras mostly for fishing in saltwater and they have all held up fine, no rust no broken pieces. I searched amazon for hours trying to choose the right set the lowest cost and i think i hit the nail on the head with this one. Id buy it again ten time over..
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: 2 Main Problems
customer_reviews.text: 1. Double sided adhesion is terrible!!! You can lose your GoPro because the stickers are not the same as GoPro stickers. 2. The clip mounts also are not the same quality. GoPro camera mounts fit loose in inside these clip bases, letting the camera wiggle slightly. Also, the 'selfie stick' is very flimsy, etc, etc. Some components are OK, but overall not worth getting this bundle when many do not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The accessories were good, not great. Still worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a camping trip and for my pool since the set came with a "floatie" handle. Works fine. The chest and head mounts are really bulky and odd looking when worn. The screw and nut assemblies are a bit loose (had trouble keeping the GoPro upright because I couldn't get the screws tight enough). Overall, I was please with the purchase. The abundance of sticky pieces, the bike mount, floating handle, and clip were my favorites. Those all work great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Suhr

customer_reviews.title: the mount broke
customer_reviews.text: I used it often for the handlebar mount and it broke the threaded teeth. I dont want to buy a whole new set just for the one piece but never got an answer on ordering just that one piece. I still use the helmet mount but I dont get all the angles I want anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my husband took this out of the of package the smell was awful! We had to return it. I can’t imagine what was on the products or what they were made of. Spend the extra $ and get a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Flgirl22

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Just as good as OEM for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: I got a ton of awesome footage with these mounts. If you're like me and were hesitant on buying non OEM mounts, do it. There's little difference between the quality of these mounts and the quality of the GOPRO mounts that are $50 EACH.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite 2 pieces are the clamp and the tripod pose ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite 2 pieces are the clamp and the tripod pose able stand. I wear a backpack when I hike and camp. Put the clamp on my shoulder strap tie a piece of rope for added security and I'm good to go. The tripod I set around a tree branch and can take some great angle shots while fishing setup camp or even just swimming with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: SandViper

customer_reviews.title: Still videoing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so long ago I can’t remember but still use a lot of the pieces. May not be the best quality but works and at that price it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional! Best Product I've bought on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This bundle is by far the best deal you can get. There are so many mounts, pads, clips, and accessories that i doubt you will need anything else. I am going out of my way to stop and write this review, because I feel that this is the best product I have ever purchased on amazon. The quality is exceptional (which I read in reviews, but was still not expecting it to be what it is) and the price unbeatable. For GoPro brand items, this would be a bundle costing close to 200 dollars. I see that the customer service is also exceptional, and I thank you Zookki for this great product
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for Decent product not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the wrist strap was ripped up right out of the package and is not usable. Some of the mount arms don't stay in place like an actual GoPro product would. The suction base has a very limited use as it has difficulty sticking to anything other than the glossiest of glossy surfaces. Other than that the product is pretty good. It's not perfect but for someone who is just using this to record everyday adventures it's pretty good. I use this product while on my motorcycle and it makes for some very diverse shots just because of all of the options.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy if You Plan to Use the Adhesive Stickers
customer_reviews.text: While most of the kit is normal knock off type devices, the adhesive stickers are a joke. Not only was the adhesive weak, but the stickers only had adhesive on one side. Since none of the mounting hardware had adhesive stickers attached, you could either attach to the mounting hardware or your helmet, but not both. This made the kit worthless to me and repeated e-mails only caused more questions.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Really thankful for the sticky mounts for flat surfaces, ...
customer_reviews.text: Really thankful for the sticky mounts for flat surfaces, etc. only problem we ran into was the selfie stick didn't work for the mount provided. Luckily the seller refunded me the cost of the stick so I bought one elsewhere. Used the suction cup mount for a bit then the cheap plastic on the lever broke. Other than that, no problems. Wouldn't buy this kit again. Will more than likely use a different brand for my new GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron F.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I feel it's worth buying. It would cost a fortune to get them all from GoPro. Although it was weird that the package and items have a very strong weird plastic smell when I opened it up. The selfie stick piece is really cheap and doesn't hold the GoPro well. The suction cup piece I would only use with a safety line. Don't trust it 100%. Can't go wrong with the extra clamps and mounts.
customer_reviews.author: MDCollectibles

customer_reviews.title: Extremely great Value
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked except for two pieces... (why it didn't get 5 stars) The wireless remote wriststrap was Velcro'd backwards, so it's useless... And the headstrap does not tighten down... Might be able to replace the nut, but haven't really looked into it.. Very good price for what you all get.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accessories were missing from the package that I got.
customer_reviews.text: The accessories in the picture are not the same that I got. 4 items were missing from the package. I tried to return the order but then o decided that I was not going to drive to the parcel place to do it. I felt very disappointed because THE Main accessories were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Poseidon

customer_reviews.title: Car Suction Cup Mount Holder - doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Car Suction Cup Mount Holder - doesn't work at all -- I tried multiple times and it FAILED -- other than that I have used so far 3-4 other ones and they worked fine .. I really wanted this car suction cup holder to work as I want to have it on my car -- NOT WORKING _ NO USE - DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: LPM

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of accessories for a great price ( and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of accessories for a great price ( and waaay cheaper than GoPro accessories). I've been using this with a Hero 3+. I've had this kit for a couple of months and I still haven't had time to use them all. The only problem I have with this kit is that there is so much that I don't even know what half of it is for; an instruction manual would have been very nice but for the price I can Google with the best of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Missing and broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, this kit was missing the head strap mount and wrist strap mount. One of the adaptors had a threaded nut that was visually out of axis which makes it extremely difficult to thread the screwbolt. The three-way adjustable pivot arm had a broken snap arm on its release buckle feature. The bag was also flimsy and it couldn't hold a closure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: When you pay $500 for a GoPro, your would expect to receive all of these accessories with the camera. Unfortunately, that is not the case, and they expect you to shell out another $20 per accessory. This kit fits our GoPro perfectly, and was incredibly cheap. Definitely worth getting if you are looking for action camera accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Activeon camera. Works with all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Activeon camera. Works with all the clips except the selfie stick. The screw was too long to fit and hold snug. Also, the self stick will not work with the plastic waterproof case that came with my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lampp

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal. Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Tons of great tools. Basically a table top full of mounts adapters and adhesive. I wa able to use several of the items with a phone mount.
customer_reviews.author: NH Dude

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Need for Action Cam Adventures
customer_reviews.text: Huge assortment of quality mounting accessories for GoPro and compatible action cams. Selfie stick seems flimsy, otherwise components seem very good. I especially liked the quality of the sun visor clip, chest harness, suction cup mount, and curved and flat helmet mounts and 3M mounting adhesive pads. BTW, the contents of this kit are way too large to fit in the included bag, which can only be used for a small set of the items.
customer_reviews.author: PC Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, a few minor things
customer_reviews.text: Good set of GoPro attachments for a much cheaper price than the official ones. Only problem is that some of the mount clips are very tight to get my GoPro in to and are unusable. They give you enough mount clips that you can have one for every attachment but I have to reuse some because my GoPro wont fit into a few. Also, the nose plug attachment makes it really hard to slide the mount clips into place. It almost feels like I'm gonna break the entire thing while using it. Overall, great selection for the price with a few minor errors that are a little annoying but are easy to work around.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package for vacation with my new session. It's true when people say, "you get what you pay for." If you just plan on using the accessories a few times then this is the best option. If you want quality accessories for regular use I suggest buying the GoPro brand. Also I thought the bag in the picture was going to be large enough to fit all of the accessories.... it's not. It only fits your screws and small mount pieces.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: These accessories were perfect for my GoPro during my trip to Thailand. I will agree with everyone else that it would be nice to have instructions for some of these items however, it is not hard to figure out. I mostly used the floating grip, the selfie stick, and the chest strap. For the price this is a great starter kit. I do wish it did come with that cool flexible tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Insanely good value!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how they're selling this kit for this price...they have to absolutely be losing money on this. It comes with everything anyone could possibly need and more for their gopro. Everything fits, works and is perfect. I'd easily pay $50+ for all of this if purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price I guess
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my GoPro mounts, these feel cheap but they do work for what I've used them for. I'm actually scared to use them for my Jeep videos, but they have been sturdy on my mountain bike rides. Chestie, handlebar and seatbar post, and sticky helmet mounts work and hold in place after multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Might want to buy some 3M double sided tape, the stuff enclosed is crappy. A little heat from the sun and this puppy fails
customer_reviews.author: Tiger800

customer_reviews.title: Gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: My hubby asked for this accessories kit for his new Go Pro. He particularly wanted the handle with extendable arm. I know this is good for snorkeling so you don't get too close and scare the fish. He uses the chest mount to record his mountain bike rides. This has enough accessories to keep him entertained for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Meh, there's better out there
customer_reviews.text: Adhesion pads are garbage. Came off within 2 hours. Shame it dosnt come with a case
customer_reviews.author: Artemis91

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great accessories for Go-Pro Lost 1 star because the windshield attachment doesn't fit the camera case perfectly. The case's mount only fit half way. Also the adjustment on the arm does tighten securely because the arm still "swings."
customer_reviews.author: upshot1

customer_reviews.title: All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: The Zookkie Accessory Kit for my GoPro HERO 4 Sessions is amazing. It came exactly as the picture shows. The items were individually bagged and in perfect condition. Everything fits perfectly with my GoPro. I can't believe that they had every accessory for my GoPro in one package at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Beekman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accessory kit for my knock off GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Awesome accessory kit for my knock off GoPro. Everything has worked well so far with no issues. This combo pack has been really fun to use in different situations and they have something in here for everything and then some. There are pieces that I haven't even used yet and we have used it several times. I will be buying this set again for my daughter who has a camera also. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Only WORKS with gopro
customer_reviews.text: This kit was advertised for Xiaomi Yi and it does not include the bridge adapter, so only the selfie stick WORKS. The other parts are useless without the bridge adapter. This only works with GoPro cameras.
customer_reviews.author: E Duran

customer_reviews.title: More goodys
customer_reviews.text: Needed a couple parts in it and the rest will be put to use sooner or later
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: It is great for everything ABOVE water
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT use any of this under water. It is great for everything ABOVE water. One use under the ocean and the GoPro supplied screws started to rust. I needed additional mounts before our trip to the South Pacific and even after normal 3 to 4 meter snorkeling dives, we washed, dried the unit but it still continued to rust.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Combs

customer_reviews.title: great but be prepared for china special
customer_reviews.text: not bad. one of the helmet quick mounts had a tab broken off out of the package so there's a bit of money down the drain. otherwise everything seems to be alright and you get a ton of stuff for next to no money
customer_reviews.author: 4DSCdude

customer_reviews.title: Just in time for my trip.
customer_reviews.text: Everything listed came in what seems like a large zip-lock bag. I have so many options to choose from now when I'm using my GoPro, but the only that was missing was instructions on how to use the accessories. It's easy to identify how to use what but I can see how some people might get confused with a few parts. Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sesmar

customer_reviews.title: Actually pretty good quality items
customer_reviews.text: I expected mostly unusable garbage but it turned out to all be pretty good stuff! Really, the quality is good. Im actually using it to film elements for network television, but I wouldn't call the quality "pro". Even thought I am a pro and its good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Works. Quality beats price.
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! it's exactly what you need for a cheap price. I would definitely say that the quality is not very special, however for the price it is definitely worth the money. I have had no problems with any of the pieces thus far.
customer_reviews.author: ZC

customer_reviews.title: the GoPro suction cup is hands down a better quality item) However
customer_reviews.text: I knew before I purchased this that the quality would be less than that of the GoPro brand, but you can't beat what you get. (For instance, the GoPro suction cup is hands down a better quality item) However, if you're not drag racing a car, or doing something crazy... It's a great pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Derek P.

customer_reviews.title: This kit is awesome. I thought it was going to be cheaply ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome. I thought it was going to be cheaply made because of the price, but I needed a kit like this for my gopro 6 and didn't want to wait. It arrived quick, and all parts were there. They quickly got mixed in with the real gopro parts and I cannot tell them apart. Very well made! I bought a second kit for the kids. Same thoughts on that kit too!
customer_reviews.author: ATDallday

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Price is great, you get what you pay for. There was an issue with some parts when I first ordered it but the company contacted me and we worked out how to improve those parts. Almost immediately I was shipped new parts with improved quality. The company really cares for their customers and will not let you down. I would definitely buy this again or recommend it to others. Also quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo T.

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is fine on most of the items included in the kit
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is fine on most of the items included in the kit. I probably wouldn't trust the floater, and the selfie stick is a bit cheap feeling, but overall, I'm very satisfied with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric. D

customer_reviews.title: Omg. what a great deal !!
customer_reviews.text: Omg , what a great value !! Everything you could possibly need , a ton of stuff . Don't hesitate to buy it , for real .
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Overall I think for the money this set is a great
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, the entire set works really well. That being said when I utilized the adhesive patches with one of the clips while mountain bike riding and the mount, as well as the go pro, fell off due to the lack of adhesion. Besides the struggle on the mountain bike ride, I have also found the chest harness to be a bit tight. Granted I am 6 feet tall and 180 pounds so it may be designed for someone with a smaller frame. Overall I think for the money this set is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Joey Scotti

customer_reviews.title: Why buy all the GoPro accessories separately? This pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Why buy all the GoPro accessories separately? This pack seriously has EVERYTHING you need. If you have a GoPro, you should have this package of add-ons and they're ALL well made. The only other thing you'll need are extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Keahu Kahuanui

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, everything you could ever need.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm amazed at just how many mounts and accessories this has. A lot of them are duplicated for what I already had, but I'd highly recommend if you have a GoPro at all, you should get this kit to be able to use the camera more often!! Such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael.T

customer_reviews.title: Good mounts
customer_reviews.text: Some mounts are hard to get in but it still works great, did have a weird smell but it disappeared
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price comes with alot of options. Haven't had anything break while running through woods with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashliegh Stone

customer_reviews.title: For a good price you receive a lot of accessories that work ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my go pro that I had just gotten and the accessories work and fit perfectly. For a good price you receive a lot of accessories that work and connect great with the camera. For anyone looking for all the essential accessories for your go pro I definitely recommend this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

product_meta.title: Zookki Camera Accessories Kit for Gopro Hero 7 6 5 4 3, Sports Accessories Kit for SJ4000/SJ5000/AKASO EK5000 EK7000/Xiaomi Yi 4K/WiMiUS Black Silver
product_meta.description: Attention: the camera and controller showed in the picture are not included in the kit. This is an essential accessories kit for all the lovers. It will comfortable with all the sizes of cameras includes hero 4/3+/3/2/1. SJ4000 SJ5000 SJ6000 cameras. Packing list: 1 x Zookki head belt strap mount. 1 x Zookki chest belt strap mount. 1 x Zookki extendable handle monopod. 1 x Zookki wrist strap mount. 1 x Zookki 360 degree rotary clip mount. 1 x Zookki bike handlebar holder mount. 1 x Zookki wrist strap (does not include remote control). 1 x Zookki car suction cup mount (7cm-diameter base). 1 x Zookki floating handle grip. 1 x Zookki three-way adjustable pivot arm. 2 x Zookki tripod mount adapter. 2 x Zookki surface j-hook buckle. 2 x Zookki surface quick release buckle. 2 x Zookki adapters (1 x long + 1 x short). 4 x Zookki screws bolts (3 x long + 1 x short). 2 x Zookki flat & 2 x arc mounts. 10 x Zookki adhesive pad (5 for flat & 5 for curved mounts).
feature_bullets: Wrist strap mount By adjusting the three-way adjustable pivot arm You can adjust your GoPro camera to any angles through the combination to enjoy all good pictures freely and easily The length adjustable belt also make it possible for the GoPro camera kit

Monopod handhold mount +rotary clip Mount It is a fashion to share an extendable handle monopod It can be elongated and shortened easily (8 to 37in) easy to carry in your pocket or bag It will help you adjust the distance and height to take pictures of yourself especially Group photo  More convenience for usage camera bundle

Chest Harness Mount + Head Mount Strap+J-Hook Buckle It allows you to install the gopro camera on your chest The chest mount harness is fully adjustable to fit all sizes making it easy to capture immersive video and photo footage from your chest Perfect for skiing moutain biking motocross paddle sports

Car suction cup mount holder + Tripod mount Adapter The Car suction cup mount holder is an universal gadgets You can adjust the GoPro to different angles by rotating the adapter's position It records the scene inside or outside the Car Easily when you are driving a car

Bike Handlebar Holder Mount + Three-way Adjustable Pivot Arm(Without Surface Quick Release Buckle) By turning the screw you can achieve the effect of adjusting the size of the interface No matter what size of your bike or motorcycle's handlebar is it can be easily and securely installed on your bike or motorcycle handlebar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,311 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
